meanings.definition: A sum of money placed or kept in a bank account.
meanings.sent1: She made regular deposits into her savings account.
meanings.sent2: The bank requires a minimum balance for deposits.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny deposits from her allowance.
meanings.sent4: Her trust in the bank was like a secure vault for her deposits.
meanings.sent5: The deposits in her account grew steadily over time.

meanings.definition: A layer or mass of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the mineral deposits in the cave.
meanings.sent2: The sediment deposits at the bottom of the lake were undisturbed.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate cake had rich deposits of fudge in every bite.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush strokes created colorful deposits on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The deposits of snow on the mountain sparkled in the sunlight.
